Title: Lethal impact of chemical weapons
Designer: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Publisher: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Notes: On the left a Mao quotation: "Strategically we should despise all our enemies, but tactically we should take them all seriously."Nr. 12 of the set 'Posters showing measures against atomic, chemical and bacterial warfare' (1971).
